function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low air change rates in occupied houses","Impact":"Higher risk of indoor air pollution and build-up of contaminants","Mitigation":"Increase air change rates through controlled ventilation systems or opening windows","Technologies":"Controlled ventilation systems, sensors for indoor air quality","People":"Occupants of the house","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers, and occupants"},{"Description":"Increased correlation between indoor and outdoor pollutant concentrations","Impact":"Higher risk of outdoor contaminants entering the indoor environment","Mitigation":"Use air filters, minimize indoor pollutant sources, and control outdoor air infiltration","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, indoor pollutant sensors, air sealing","People":"Occupants of the house","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers, and occupants"}]}
